synopsis.text: Fortune Lover, a beloved otome game from her past life, has become the treacherous reality for the young Catarina Claes, daughter of Duke Claes. After a fateful head injury, she regains memories of her former life as a Japanese girl, and the stark realization that she now inhabits the world of the gameâ€”as the villainous Catarina Claes! With every possible outcome leading to her exile or death, she must utilize her knowledge of the game and her own cunning to avoid the dreaded "flags of doom." As she navigates this perilous world, Catarina embarks on a mission to break off her engagement with the prince and rewrite her destiny. Can she successfully dodge tragedy and forge her own path to happiness in this romantic comedy filled with misunderstandings? Join Catarina in her thrilling journey as she transforms from the antagonist to the heroine of her own story!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
